1.content:
You have stumbled upon this story, and now you need to make a choice. Who is going to grow or shrink?

Remember, only male giants please!


Ben Tennyson
16 year old Ben is the hero of the tale. The power of the Ultimatrix on his wrist gives him the ability to morph into multiple different aliens. One day the Ultimatrix goes haywire, and instead of morphing into an alien he instead changes size.

Keven E. Levin
Kevin is Ben's 17 year old rival, although recently there has been a truce as they work on the same team. But that rivalry is still there. Kevin has the ability to absorb different substances into his body, changing it's composition as well as the ability to absorb energy. One day he finds a substance that doesn't just change him, it changes his size.

Coop
Coop is the tall and hunky technophile friend of Ben's. He can do anything with machines, and one day an accident with some alien tech leaves him expanding.

Other
Another character to grow perhaps?
1.title: Character Introduction

11.content: Before we start, what direction should this story take?
11.title: Story Direction

choices: At a large electrical-looking tower (Instant growth - Huge)
At a mine in the middle of the desert, with many caverns (Moderate growth)
At the ocean, where an alien ship waits (Slow growth)
113.content:
The night was long, but was not yet over. Ben and Kevin were both out in the desert, attempting to follow up on a lead of alien sightings, while Gwen was away for the week. Before she left, she told them it was a good time for them to bond, as she was sick of their fighting/niggling at each other.

Kevin hummed while he concentrated on driving, trying to ignore the annoyance in the seat next to him. Ben had a way of grinding Kevin's nerves, leading Kevin to subconsciously wonder whether it was his attraction to Ben that was leading to his reluctance to make a serious move with Gwen. But those were thoughts that were never pulled from his deepest voids. Hostility was a good choice for now.

Meanwhile Ben sat twiddling with the Omnitrix, seeing if he could mess with and find the master code again. Unlocking the watch's power would certainly help towards the coming battles, especially with more and more powerful forces working their way into the dealings with Earth. But so far the Omnitrix isn't behaving, it refuses to release the secrets contained within.

Kevin pulls over to the side of the road, they're there.

Where are they?
113.title: Into the desert

choices: As planned! The Omnitrix is neutralized!
It goes wrong! Ben reacts somehow!
1131.content:
In the middle of the desert a large tower loomed over the surrounding landscape. It looked alien in design, and appeared to be giving off a weird sort of radiation, it was messing with Kevin's car's instruments.

A screech is heard cutting across the night, and suddenly Kevin and Ben are both surrounded by a gaggle of DNAliens.

"Great!" Kevin exclaims. "We drive all the way out to the middle of nowhere to be caught instantly."

"We're not caught yet", Ben replies, hitting his wrist. "SPIDER MONK - what? I mean JETRAY!"
The omnitrix hadn't obeyed the command, and instead switched to Jetray. However since this happens frequently, Ben put it down to the watching being weird. As he transformed, he didn't notice the screen of the device flash orange for a second, before returning to green.

Kevin kneels down and absorbs the rocky ground of the desert, and they start to fake. It was as if it was any other fight with the DNAliens, easy and ultimately pointless. The DNAliens were completely outclassed. Unfortunately for Kevin and Ben, the DNAliens didn't want to beat the boys, they wanted to delay them. The tower would be activated, and the radiation released should react to the Omnitrix, eliminating the threat of Ben once and for all. The whole thing had been a setup.

The tower begins to glow...

choices: Giant Ben enjoys his new size (and so does Kevin)

11312.content:
The tower beings to hum, a large electrical noise - much like something powerful building up. Upon hearing this the DNAliens all flee, leaving Kevin and Ben looking bewildered at the tower.

"Whatever that is, it can't be good" Ben yells down to Kevin, while circling the Tower as Jetray.

"All I can tell is it is giving off insane readings, something I've never seen before. The radiation seems to be on the level of the Omnitrix" Kevin replies, checking his dashboard instruments. "I can't make any sense of it".

The humming stops, and for a moment it looks like nothing happens; but only for a moment. A burst of orange light appears at the tip of the tower, the ball of light expanding instantly and bathing the surrounding regions in the glow. Like a flash; it's there and then suddenly gone.

Suddenly the Omnitrix starts to react on Ben, and in a flash Jetray crashes to the ground. Ben morphs back to normal, but an amazing thing happens that has Kevin staring up in disbelief. Ben is glowing like he does when he morphs, but he's expanding - by a lot. By the time the morph has finished Ben is twice as tall as the 200 foot tower.

The DNAlien plan backfired, instead of eliminating the Omnitrix and Ben, it altered how the Omnitrix works. Now whenever Ben returns to normal after morphing, his human form will alter in size. A 400 foot tall teenager is hard to hide, so what should they do?

choices: Measuring against socked toes is difficult, Kevin suggests Ben remove the sock..
113121.content:
Ben looked down at the ground, amazed to see his new height of 400 feet.

"Well this is definitely new, but I can't say I don't like it."

Peering down at the ground, Ben spots the tiny Kevin, barely bigger than an inch tall (comparatively). He kneels down to get closer to his tiny friend. For his part, Kevin takes the size change quite well. Sure, Ben (who used to be shorter than Kevin) could now fit Kevin quite comfortably under his big toe, but that wasn't anything to be scared of. It was in a way, erotic. Kevin never expressed it before, but there was a definite spark between the two of them.

"THAT'S DEFINITELY DIFFERENT" Kevin yells, trying to make himself heard.

"Relax, I can hear you fine. Actually, I can hear a lot of things. I think I've got superhearing from this size" Ben replied.

Relaxing back and stretching his legs out, Ben smiled happily. Meanwhile Kevin walked over to the titan's shoes and compared himself.

"Dude, look at the size of you. Your shoe is a house! I bet I'd be smaller than your toe."

Ben grinned, and reached down to untie his laces and slowly slide the shoe Kevin is standing next to off.

"What are you doing?"

"I want to see if you're right!"

Kevin gulped, but also started to get aroused by the massive foot emerging from the shoe.

"Sure, let's see."

Ben finished pulling off the shoe, and then moved his leg towards him, so his knee was pointing in the air and his socked foot was flat on the ground. Kevin walked over to the big toe, and then laid down next to it, as close as possible. It was difficult to see through the sock which was longer, the toe or the teenager. Either way, Kevin closed his eyes and breathed in the scent from the socked foot, he was definitely enjoying this. Ben was a little surprised. "You mean you want to be next to my bare foot?" he asked.

"Well it isn't my first choice of surrounding... but it isn't my last choice either" Kevin replied, winking at Ben in the process.

12.content: Before we start, what direction should this story take?

The growth concerned Kevin a little, he wondered how big he would get, and he wondered if Ben would escape. However the joy of growing, the power he had, all of this overpowered any other feeling. info.brief_description: The guys of Ben 10 Alien Force/Ultimate Alien grow to titanic heights!
info.description:
Ben 10 Ultimate Alien Giants
They guys of Ben 10 Ultimate Alien grow to titanic heights.

Sadly, there are a few rules.
1. This is a guys story. Giant Guys. No girls sorry.
2. No getting fat. This isn't that kind of story.
3. No toilet stuff. It isn't wanted.
4. No crossovers. Reasoning: They create confusion, specially when names are misspelled and such. This story is about Ben 10 Ultimate Alien, so keep it there.

All characters are out of character! There is no way Ben really would rampage ect (although Kevin might).

Posts: Please keep posts to do with the story. I don't want any chapters added complaining about things. I'll just delete them. Chapters are for stories, not rants. (I've seen good stories ruined by ranting).
